title: Islamophobic woman faces six years in jail after filming herself urinating on Koran before setting it alight
text:
UNHOLY ROW Islamophobic woman faces six years in jail after filming herself urinating on Koran before setting it alight 
She posted the sickening video online but the clip has since been removed BY SAM WEBB Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments A MUM who filmed herself urinating on the Koran before burning it and then threatening Muslims faces six years in prison. 
The young woman was seen in the clip standing in front of the Slovak national flag with the Muslim holy book which she insults, soils and then sets alight – a vile insult to followers of Islam. CEN The woman in the video displays the holy book before defiling it CEN In this horrifying still from the video, she is seen urinating on the holy book CEN She then torches the pages as a final insult 
She posted the sickening video online but the clip has since been removed. 
The woman was identified as mum-of-one Sheila Szmerekova, 24, from the central Slovakian city of Ruzomberok. She was arrested and taken into preventative custody. 
A Special Court in Banska Bystrica ruled after a two-hour-long hearing that the woman was to be taken into custody to prevent her from committing any crimes while she awaits trial. She is accused of creating extremist promotional materials, defamation of a nation and race and incitement of national, racial or ethnic hatred. 
The young woman covered her face with a piece of paper outside court and did not speak to media. 
According to spokeswoman of the general prosecutor’s office Andrea Predajnova, the video was shared online in December 2016. CEN 4 The woman was identified as Sheila Szmerekova, 24 
A police spokeswoman said: “In the video she shows a book with the title The Koran and she repeatedly said that it was the Koran.” 
“She tore out the pages and threw them on the ground. She urinated on the pages and wiped herself with some, and then she set them on fire.” 
Szmerekova also verbally attacked Muslims in the video. She said: “I will hunt you all step by step. No matter if it is a woman, a child or a man. I will bump off anybody who gets in my way. 
“I do not care about the criminal complaints. It will not stop me. I have a message for everybody, including the police – nobody will stop me.” 
Her social media profiles were full of extremist opinions and hatred against Muslims. The young woman was told she faces up to six years in prison. 
Her mother Olga told Slovak media that Sheila spent a few months in a psychiatric ward and at a youth detention centre. 
She is a mother of seven-year-old son Tobias, who was taken away from her because she drank too much and did not take care of the boy, according to local media. 
The divisive leader’s blond, bouffant hair could hardly be seen amid the crowd of police, supporters and protesters at a market near Rotterdam. 
Opponents, meanwhile, held up signs saying “Refugees Welcome” and “Don’t Let Them Scare You.”
